document.full_text: lastpass, a service for managing passwords, said that out of concern about a possible hacking attack, it would force its more than 1 million users to change their master passwords.
document.title: password service warns of possible hacking attack
lines_and_colors: lastpass, a service for managing passwords, said that out of concern about a possible hacking attack, it would force its more than 1 million users to change their master passwords.
